synopsis.p: Plot the colors in a color bar and save them as a Portable PixMap (PPM) file.

description.p: Plot the colors in a color bar and save them as a Portable PixMap (PPM) file.
The PPM will be one pixel high and as many pixels wide as there are colors in the color bar. The image will be one pixel wide if the "-vertical" option is specified.

example.description: Create a Portable PixMap (PPM) file called "rainbow.key" from the color bar in the file "rainbow.key"
